medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began about 24 hours ago, starting as a dull, aching sensation in the midepigastric and umbilical area. The pain gradually worsened and localized to the right lower quadrant, becoming sharp. Symptoms were exacerbated by bumps in the car ride. Associated symptoms include chills, nausea, and one episode of non-bilious vomiting.
